description.value:
The mind can flit from thought to thought; why too shouldn't you? You focus on motion in a higher order of spatial dimensions, not just the typical three, allowing for versatile abilities that alter positioning.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qTr2oCgIXl703Whb]{Thoughtful Gift}

  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate}
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.m4Mc5XbdML92BKOE]{Strange Geometry}
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c3XygMbzrZMgV1y3]{Collective Transposition}
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ggtZTxeyEnDYbt6f]{Momentary Recovery}
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze}
